acclaim.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to praise someone or something publicly
acclaim.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: His work was acclaimed by art critics.
acclaim.translation[1].definitions[0].de: praise for a person or their achievements
acclaim.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: The young singer is enjoying critical acclaim  (=praise by people who are paid to give their opinion on art, music etc).
Their recordings have won great acclaim.
